DESCRIPTION:
2034 - Deep beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the decaying subway tunnels, the
remnants of humanity struggle to survive. Hordes of mutants storm last refuge of survivors. But instead
of unite, subway stations are divided into warring factions that fought each other for control of the
underground. Under the ground started this civil war that could wipe humanity from the face of the
earth. You - Artem, and you have the key to the survival of mankind - The last ray of light in this
dark time.

GAME FEATURES:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Spectacular first-person shooter and the long awaited sequel to Metro 2033, which was warmly
received by critics.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use in combat numerous home-made weapons against humans and mutants or quietly kill their
enemies under the cover of darkness.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dive headlong into a post-apocalyptic the world of the Moscow Metro - one of the most exciting
worlds ever created by man.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fight for every bullet in this beautiful mix first-person shooter and horror. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New generation technologies shake elaborated lighting and physics of the game.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play in a post-apocalyptic multiplayer mode, visiting various dark ruins of Moscow.
